title: Area covered under staircase/lift/staircase and lift lobby for AH tenements/Amenities shall not be counted in FSI/BUA and shall be without charging premium
clause_text: Area covered under staircase/lift/staircase and lift lobby for AH tenements/Amenities shall not be counted in FSI/BUA and shall be without charging premium.
section: Compensation for development of infrastructure in lands handed over to MCGM and constructed BUA.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Area covered under staircase/lift/staircase and lift lobby for AH tenements/Amenities shall not be counted in FSI/BUA and shall be without charging premium.
